stories.title: Heat Mitigation
stories.description: NYC Cool Roofs coats building roofs with reflective paint which reduces cooling costs and cuts energy usage.

stories.title: Extreme Weather Events
stories.description: Being prepared for an increase in heavy downpours and extreme weather events is one of the MTA's foremost challenges.

stories.title: Reducing the Carbon Footprint
stories.description: Daylighting systems capture sunlight through a rooftop dome to reduce energy costs and demand on the grid.

stories.title: Making housing resilient
stories.description: The New York City Housing Authority (NYCHA) is redesigning its buildings to withstand extreme weather events.
